+                                    <name>standalone.xml</name>

+                                        <layer>h2-default-datasource</layer>
+                                        <layer>microprofile-fault-tolerance</layer>
+                                        <layer>microprofile-jwt</layer>
+                                        <layer>microprofile-openapi</layer>
